about_the_game:
Vampires Fable


An addictive two-player coop adventure in which cooperation and skill are the keys to survival.

Vampires Fable is a combination of arcade and puzzle game, set in a dark world full of secrets and dangers. Take on the role of Ben - a magical engineer and veteran vampire hunter - or his 16-year-old daughter Jane, who becomes the target of a bloodthirsty beast.
After returning from a long and difficult mission, Ben wants only one thing - safety for his daughter. He considers various possibilities. Unfortunately, Ben and Jane's happiness is quickly interrupted when the girl is kidnapped by a merciless vampire. Now, Ben must embark on an expedition full of danger to save his child. Only by working together can Ben and Jane find their way back to each other and defeat the forces of darkness.

Key Game Features:


  • Cooperative gameplay for two players - cooperation is the key to success. Work together to solve puzzles and find your way back to each other
  • Two unique play styles - Play as Ben, the vampire hunter, or Jane, his daughter, and experience different puzzles and game mechanics
  • Deep Plot - Ben and Jane's story will draw you in from the very first minute and won't let you go until the finale. Each puzzle and environmental element is closely related to the plot, creating a cohesive and engaging game world
  • Varied puzzles - from logical challenges to arcade elements - Vampires Fable offers a wide range of puzzles that will test your ingenuity and reflexes
  • Dark, atmospheric setting - the game impresses with rich, detailed locations and atmospheric music that draw you into the gothic atmosphere

Will you manage to save Jane before it's too late? Immerse yourself in the world of Vampires Fable and see if you can survive the fight against the darkness.

NOTE: The game has a cooperative mode only. It requires both players to use a PC-compatible microphone, an Internet connection and an external voice communicator.

short_description: Vampires Fable is a coop, adventure, story-driven game for two players, combining the best of escape room games, puzzle games and arcade games. None of the players will be able to solve the puzzle alone. Whether you manage to find your way back to each other depends only on your communication.
